item.title: Code Styles
item.description: Code Style When you are collaborating on a code project with teammates It is highly recommended to agree on a same code style. That would directly help to quickly grasp others code and still being on the trail when code is left behign for a while. In Python we have two styles: PEP8 = Default python style guide PEP257 = Docstring style guide Some coding rules according to PEP8
